title: MD
biography: Gaddam Vivekanand also known as Gaddam Vivek Venkatswamy, is an Indian politician from Indian National Congress and former Member of Parliament in the 15th Lok Sabha. He represented Peddapalli parliamentary constituency.
aiSummary: G. Vivekanand is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 11 at Cardiac electrophysiology (Member). Has been published in The Science of The Total Environment, International Journal of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences, Journal of Food Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
